Command to Check OpenVMS User Requirements [PREVIOUS] [TOP] [NEXT]

5.3 Command to Check OpenVMS User Requirements

$ SHOW PROC/PRIV/QUOTA
Process Quotas:
Account name:
CPU limit: InfiniteDirect I/O limit:150
Buffered I/O byte count quota: 99808Buffered I/O limit: 150
Timer queue entry quota: 10Open file quota: 100
Paging file quota 63456Subprocess quota: 10
Default page fault cluster: 64AST quota: 248
Enqueue quota: 1999Shared file limit:0
Max detached processes: 0Max active jobs: 0
Authorized privileges:
NETMBX TMPMBX

Your system manager uses the AUTHORIZE utility to change your (or all users') account quotas and privileges to meet the requirements. If any of the user requirements are not met, some VICAR tasks may not run. Error messages may not clearly define the problem.
